intro: Belenia praealta, commonly known as the tall belenia, is a species of flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, upright stems and opposite, ovate leaves with a slightly hairy texture. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in inflorescences. Belenia praealta is often found in rocky soils and is adapted to semi-arid environments.
